mdRecord.dcterms:title: Battle-field of Five Forks: "Cotton" map, No. 2
Battlefield of Five Forks
Cotton map no 2
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bien, Julius, 1826-1909
Cotton, J. P. civil engineer
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 44 x 35 cm. on sheet 56 x 48 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown by spot heights and pictorially.
"Battle-field of Five Forks" printed below the map; "Cotton" map No. 2" appears at top of sheet.
Tables: April 1st. 1865; positions of sun in the sky -- Mean time of rising & setting of sun & setting of moon.
Lists Union and Confederate Army units participating in the battle, and locates features of the landscape.
This map presumably issued in one of the publications of the Warren Court of Inquiry held in 1883.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Some handwritten changes and additions to map. Linen-backed, with some loss of image at old fold lines.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Warren, G. K. (Gouverneur Kemble), 1830-1882
Five Forks, Battle of, Va., 1865--Maps
Five Forks (Dinwiddie County, Va.)--Maps
